comment.author: 97449017@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Sweden before 1945, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 81594342@N00
comment._content: Very good technically. I wish I could know what camera, lens, etc was used.

comment.author: 34419668@N08
comment._content:
Enric Martinez: There is a camera equipment (for travels) that belonged to Carl Curman in the collections of  The National Museum of Science and Technology (Tekniska museet) in Stockholm. "Folding camera of German design, lens Voigtländer Rapid, wide-angle, Euryscop. Iris diaphragm", etc. - as a summary description. :)

/Anna B.
